functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Spirit Boomerang\",\"color\":\"blue\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Combat boomerangs are rare, and","color":"gray"}','{"text":"spirit variants all the more so, for","color":"gray"}','{"text":"their ability to pass through walls","color":"gray"}','{"text":"and strike foes without line of","color":"gray"}','{"text":"sight is a great feat of engineering","color":"gray"}','{"text":"and casting.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 20 (Max)","color":"gray"}','{"text":"-20% Damage on Boomerang Hit","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+20% Damage on Kill","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUIDLeast:48003675,UUIDMost:-754049,Slot:"mainhand"}],HideFlags:6,Damage:3,HoldingID:50,CustomModelData:3}
